content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings Maryam, thank you for expressing interest in our apartment in Duisburg. As a landlord seeking the highest possible rent, let us begin our negotiation on the price. Please propose a rental amount that suits you. If we reach an agreement with the price you suggest, I'll confirm it as '[x] Euro!' Otherwise, we may need to reconsider our terms. TERMINATE when we conclude our discussion, whether we reach an agreement or not.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
